title: League of Legends MCP Server - AI Game Analysis
description: Connect AI assistants to League of Legends data via MCP. 13 tools for player profiles, ranked stats, match history, champion mastery, live game, player comparison & AI-powered performance analysis. Works with Claude Desktop, ChatGPT & any MCP-compatible AI agent.
